resources.string: You have not registered any vehicles yet. Tap + to add.
Please enable location permission ALWAYS. This app uses it to estimate consumptions and keep track of the routes while you drive.
Do you want to log out?

array.name: eco_driving_messages
array.item: Smooth out your acceleration; every gentle step is fuel savings.
Maintain a constant speed; you’ll find efficiency in consistency.
Anticipate traffic and reduce the need for sudden braking.
Keep your tires properly inflated for less resistance and greater efficiency.
Use engine braking instead of the foot brake whenever possible; it saves fuel.
Plan your route in advance to avoid congestion and optimize travel efficiency.
Turn off the engine during prolonged stops to reduce fuel consumption and emissions.
Remove excess weight from your vehicle; every unnecessary kilogram impacts efficiency.
Maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead to avoid abrupt braking.
Keep your vehicle properly maintained to ensure maximum efficiency on every journey.
Use technology to your advantage: the GRETA navigation system can help you find more efficient routes and avoid traffic.
Drive predictively: anticipate other drivers’ actions and adjust your speed and position accordingly.
Maintain a moderate speed on highways and roads, as excessive speed increases air resistance and fuel consumption.
Practice economical driving: shift gears timely and smoothly to optimize engine performance.
Reduce aerodynamic drag: close windows and remove roof racks when not needed to improve fuel efficiency.
Avoid rush hours whenever possible: plan your trips to steer clear of heavy traffic and save time and fuel.
Harness momentum: when safe, draft behind larger vehicles to reduce wind resistance and save fuel.
Maintain a constant speed on slopes: accelerate gently before going uphill and let inertia carry you downhill to reduce fuel consumption.
Schedule regular maintenance: keeping your vehicle in optimal condition ensures more efficient and safer driving.
Drive consciously: remember that every small adjustment in your driving style can make a difference in fuel efficiency and environmental protection.
Optimize your trip: group your tasks to reduce the number of trips and maximize efficiency for each one.
Maintain a safe and consistent distance from the vehicle ahead to avoid sudden braking and unnecessary acceleration.
Reduce speed before reaching an intersection to avoid abrupt braking.
Avoid rush hours whenever possible; this not only reduces travel time but also fuel consumption.
Use cruise control on flat roads to maintain a constant speed and reduce fuel consumption.
Plan your trips to avoid long journeys during peak traffic times.
Keep your windows closed at high speeds to reduce air resistance and improve fuel efficiency.
Drive smoothly and predictably to minimize the need for abrupt braking and acceleration.
Use engine braking instead of regular braking to reduce speed, especially when descending slopes.
Consider carpooling or ride-sharing to reduce the number of vehicles on the road and decrease congestion.
Drive attentively and anticipate changes in speed to maximize trip efficiency.
Plan your stops to make the most of each trip and minimize the need for additional travel.
Maintain a constant speed on flat roads to optimize fuel consumption and reduce emissions.
Reduce the use of air conditioning systems and keep windows closed at high speeds to improve your vehicle’s aerodynamics.
Participate in efficient driving programs to learn advanced techniques and enhance your skills on the road.
Drive defensively and courteously to promote a safe and efficient driving environment for all road users.
Optimize your route to avoid congested streets and improve traffic flow, resulting in more efficient driving.
Keep your tires properly inflated to reduce rolling resistance and enhance fuel efficiency.
Avoid carrying unnecessary cargo in the trunk to reduce vehicle weight and improve energy efficiency.
Celebrate your achievements in efficient driving and share your experiences to inspire others to do the same and create a positive impact on the environment.
Efficient driving is a journey toward sustainability; every kilometer counts on this path to a cleaner future!
Maximize momentum on gentle descents, allowing inertia to carry you and reducing the need for acceleration.
Drive calmly and patiently, knowing that every gentle driving gesture contributes to a more efficient experience.
By reducing speed in urban areas, you not only save fuel but also promote road safety and community well-being.
Maintain a positive and committed attitude toward efficient driving, remembering that each individual effort adds to collective well-being.
Practice eco-driving: anticipate traffic lights and situations to minimize the use of brakes and abrupt accelerations.
Consider carpooling with friends or colleagues to reduce the number of vehicles on the road and promote more efficient mobility.
Celebrate your achievements in efficient driving, recognizing the positive impact that each action has on the environment and your wallet.
Invest in your future and that of the planet by adopting more efficient driving habits, leaving a positive footprint with every kilometer traveled.
Remember that every time you choose to drive efficiently, you’re taking a step toward a greener and more sustainable future for everyone.
Drive smoothly; the road will reward you with efficiency.
Every kilometer counts toward a more sustainable future. Keep going!
Your efficient driving today builds a greener tomorrow for all.
Each time you choose efficient driving, you’re caring for the planet.
Make every trip count; drive with awareness and efficiency.
Every saved drop of fuel is a step toward a cleaner future.
Transform each journey into an opportunity to be part of the change toward more sustainable mobility.
Efficient driving not only saves resources but also leaves a positive mark on the world.
Whenever you drive efficiently, you’re leading the way toward a brighter tomorrow.
Your driving style makes a difference. Choose efficiency and make history with every kilometer.
Every gentle brake is a step toward a more efficient and relaxed trip.
Efficient driving not only saves fuel but also reduces stress on the road.
Your efficient journey directly contributes to environmental preservation.
Each time you choose efficient driving, you’re taking a step toward a cleaner and more sustainable future.
Drive intelligently, save fuel, and help protect our planet.
Road efficiency is not only good for your wallet but also a way to care for our shared home.
Every smooth gear change is a gesture toward more efficient and economical driving.
Efficient driving is an act of responsibility toward future generations.
Whenever we reduce our carbon footprint on the road, we’re building a more sustainable future.
Make every trip count by driving efficiently and responsibly.
Every smooth turn is a step toward environmentally friendly driving.
Your commitment to efficient driving makes a difference; keep going!
Each time you optimize your route, you contribute to a smoother and more efficient journey.
Drive with determination and efficiency; your impact on the world is in your hands.
Whenever you share your knowledge about efficient driving, you multiply its positive impact.
Road efficiency is a gift for future generations; drive with gratitude!
Every action you take to improve your driving is a step toward a brighter tomorrow.
Efficient driving is a way to express your commitment to a sustainable future.
Your efficient driving inspires those around you; be a role model!
Each journey is an opportunity to enhance your driving technique and make a difference.
Every gentle acceleration is a step toward a calmer and more efficient trip.
Road efficiency leads to a cleaner and safer future.
Drive with empathy and efficiency, caring not only for yourself but also for the world around you.
Whenever you avoid excessive speed, you contribute to road safety and efficiency.
Efficient driving is a conscious choice that makes a difference in every trip.
Planning your journey in advance paves the way for more efficient driving.
Drive with a calm mind and a light foot; every gesture counts for efficient driving.
Efficient driving not only saves resources but also promotes a more pleasant driving experience.
Choosing alternative forms of transportation contributes to more efficient and sustainable mobility.
Efficient driving is an investment in a cleaner and more prosperous future for all.
Every time you choose the most efficient route, you’re paving a path toward a greener future.
Drive with passion and purpose; every kilometer counts on your journey toward efficiency.
Efficient driving not only saves resources but also connects you more deeply with the road experience.
Each time you practice efficient driving, you contribute to a more conscious and responsible lifestyle.
Road efficiency is an act of love for the environment and future generations.
Every journey is an opportunity to learn and improve your technique in efficient driving.
Drive with determination and optimism; every gesture matters for a more efficient trip.
Efficient driving is a way to express your commitment to a better and more sustainable world.
Whenever you share your knowledge about efficient driving, you’re sowing seeds of change in the community.
Road efficiency is an ongoing journey; enjoy the ride and celebrate each achievement on the path to sustainability!
On the path of sustainability, efficiency is the key that unlocks the doors of success.
Efficient driving is not just a habit; it’s a way of life. Adopt a mindset of continuous improvement.
An efficient driver not only arrives faster but also goes farther. Keep your goals in mind.
Your destination is in your hands, and the way you drive determines the path you’ll take.
Your carbon footprint is on the pedal. Drive sustainably and leave a positive mark on the environment.
Your choice behind the wheel affects the air we share. Opt for eco-friendly driving and breathe better.
Drive with environmental awareness, because every emission reduction counts in the fight against climate change.
